mapper.select: SELECT post_num, title, content, writer, REG_DATE, views, COMMENT_COUNT from OPENCOLUMN WHERE AND notice=0 order by post_num desc LIMIT #{postBeginPoint}, #{displayPostLimit}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OPENCOLUMN(TITLE, WRITER, REG_DATE, VIEWS, CONTENT, COMMENT_COUNT, NOTICE) VALUES(#{title}, #{writer}, NOW(), 0, #{content}, 0, #{notice})
mapper.select: select count(*) from openColumn where and notice=0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OPENCOLUMN_COMMENT(POST_NUM, ID, REG_DATE, CONTENT) VALUES(#{postNum}, #{id}, NOW(), #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.POST_NUM, A.COMMENT_NUM, A.ID, A.REG_DATE, A.CONTENT, B.NICKNAME FROM OPENCOLUMN_COMMENT A INNER JOIN MEMBER B ON A.ID=B.ID WHERE A.POST_NUM=#{postNum} ORDER BY A.COMMENT_NUM DESC) LIMIT #{postBeginPoint}, #{displayPostLimit} ORDER BY COMMENT_NUM
mapper.update: UPDATE openColumn SET COMMENT_COUNT= (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM OPENCOLUMN_COMMENT WHERE POST_NUM=#{postNum}) WHERE POST_NUM=#{postNum}
